name: Jagten På Bubbers Badekar
overview: Jagten På Bubbers Badekar (Danish for Hunt for Bubber's Bathtub) is a weird little Euro-style arcade adventure from Denmark in which you have to find the character's bathtub, which was stolen. The game was developed by Ole Mogensen & Michael Lauridsen and published by Interactivision in 1991. An unofficial English translation with the English title of Hunt for Bubber's Bathtub was released by the cracking group Laxity in 2013.
